editorialNotes.standard: Clobber pesky rebels while rallying villagers and recruiting heroes in this idle strategic defense game.

A phenomenon from the start, Pok√©mon GO hasn‚Äôt stopped evolving. Since launch, the best-in-class location-based AR game has expanded with countless improvements. Hatch eggs while the game runs in the background. Battle other trainers with your favorite creatures. Join memorable community day events. With a steady stream of awesome updates and hundreds of iconic creatures to catch, Niantic‚Äôs groundbreaking hit just keeps getting better.

Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercell‚Äôs awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package that‚Äôs easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, there‚Äôs no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

ios.subtitle: Open and stack the new states

editorialNotes.tagline: Can you build the best base?
editorialNotes.standard: It's hard to understate Clash of Clans‚Äô massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobile. Over time the build, train, and attack gameplay has been honed to perfection through fantastic updates. We still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught, and to experience the rush of victory after our carefully assembled attack force yet again smashed through enemy defenses.

Years ago, Plants vs. Zombies defined a genre with its fresh concept, undeniable charm, and innovative, balanced gameplay. Now the undead have risen again, bringing with them new time-traveling tales and a massive slew of new zombies and plants. Whether you stomp enemies without paying a dime or buy new experimental plants and power-ups with In-App Purchases, the result is the same: an incredible sequel that's fresh and fun throughout, reminding us why we fell in love with this world in the first place.

Presented as a holotable full of Star Wars champions, Galaxy of Heroes lets you form a team and leap into thrilling turn-based battles. Playing as Luke Skywalker, Boba Fett, Ahsoka Tano and other characters from the films and animated series, you‚Äôll need smart tactics to beat enemy squads. Missions take you from Hoth to Tatooine to Imperial ships‚Äîand gorgeous graphics make every sabre slash and blaster shot look spectacular. Even when you‚Äôre not fighting, though, the piles of unlockable characters, gear and abilities ensure you‚Äôll have plenty to do.

Build the metropolis of your dreams in this free-to-play city builder from EA. Stunning graphics, intuitive controls, and addictive mechanics make the experience truly extraordinary. Behind its polished gleam, SimCity BuildIt retains the same high-quality gameplay fans have come to expect from this enduring franchise.

ios.subtitle: This game is not what it seems
Choose a Pok√©mon and team up!

editorialNotes.standard: The cheerful humor of the Bikini Bottom crew keeps us smiling as we juggle orders in chaotic cooking challenges.

editorialNotes.standard: No mere port of a pre-existing classic, this is a stunning reimagining of perhaps our most beloved business-building sim. We love snagging new card packs to build bigger and better rides, and our inner Walt Disney obsesses over the perfect placement of attractions, restaurants, and, of course, restrooms‚Äîyou never know when a customer is going to find one of our roller coaster creations a little too intense.

editorialNotes.standard: Reworked and retrofitted for gaming on the go, League of Legends: Wild Rift brings the franchise‚Äôs twitchy thrills, unmatched depth, and nail-biting tactics to iPhone and iPad. Each match is a fast-paced 5v5 tug-of-war. Pick from dozens of champions and head onto the battlefield, charging down one of three lanes as you help your team destroy the enemy‚Äôs Nexus. Combining slick, accessible touchscreen controls with the tactical brilliance that turned League of Legends into a worldwide sensation, Wild Rift is a must-play MOBA for newcomers and vets alike.
Jellyfish-like spacecraft! Gigantic mechs! Forge the right equipment and there‚Äôs nothing your scrappy battleship can‚Äôt handle.
